turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, can you please order me a drink?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes ma'am, what are you in the mood for today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I' d like to order a coffee from the Starbucks on pike st, Seattle in the market.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what size and drink would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a Grande caramel machiatto.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, would you like that iced?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And would you like and extra shot or any extra flavorings

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I'd like two extra shots and 6 pumps of vanilla.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And what kind of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to have far free milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Mmhmmmm, ok, I'm going to call that right in for you ma'am.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like anything else, maybe a sandwich or cookie?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thank you. Trying to slim down.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh (lol) you don't need that, let me repeat the order back to you. One Grande iced caramel macchiato, with fat free milk, two extra shots, and 6 pumps of vanilla.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that is perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you, can you please go pick it up for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I have put in the order to starbucks, I will pick it up in just a moment.
